item.title: This Is The New Shit
item.description: [[songs/m/ministry/twitch/the_angel.md#wheres-your-angel-now-vyl-wnanory|Everything has been said before]] [[songs/m/ministry/twitch/the_angel.md#wheres-your-angel-now-vyl-wnanory|There’s nothing left to say anymore]] [[songs/m/ministry/twitch/the_angel.md#wheres-your-angel-now-vyl-wnanory|When it’s all the same, you can ask for it by name]] [[songs/n/nitzer_ebb/belief/shame.
